item.title: Building a Second Brain
item.description: From: [[BOOKS/Building a Second Brain]] Borrowed Creativity - creativity is all about remixing knowledge The Capture Habit - whenever you come up with an idea you should write it down.

item.title: Bucket list
item.description: Bucket list Hike mighty mountains within my reach Mount Fuji, Japan Kilimanjaro, Tanzania Mount Whitney, California Mount Kosciuszko, Australia Mount Toubkal, Morocco Mount Katahdin, Maine Mount Temple, Canada Cerro Chirripo, Costa Rica Mauna Kea, Hawaii Snowdonia, Wales Resources 10 Mighty Mountains That (Almost) Anyone Can Summit (smartertravel.

item.title: DISC
item.description: DISC My test results: ![[ATTACHMENTS/DISC Paweł Lipowczan.pdf]] What to focus on: Be more active in discussions - show that you have a lot to tell and your knowledge is deep and wide.

item.title: Motivation system for my kids
item.description: Motivation system for my kids [[ABOUT/Roles/Father]] It is in constant development so it might change over time. What I tried Schedules - created a weekly schedules on which kids could track their progress and show me how they did.

item.title: How i read books
item.description: I hate to read Since beginning of my life I didn’t like to read and until now I wasn’t able to change it.

item.title: I have a business and not business has me
item.description: How not to become a slave of your own business Three commandments: You cannot loose. You are a winner from the start.

item.title: About
item.description: About Hello! I’m Pawel Lipowczan. Software Engineer, Developer and Architect from Poland, Ustron. I have rich experience in web, desktop and mobile development.

item.title: Habits
item.description: Habits Aktualnie Rano (6:20): Walking the dog (10 min) Wim Hoff’s WHM breathing exercises or Meditation - relaxation, counting breaths, mindfulness (15 min) Celery juice or water with lemon (10 min) Brushing teeth (left hand) (5 min) Tabata (5 min) Cold shower (5 min) Walking with autiobook/podcast (20 min) Breakfast (20 min) Rozpoczęcie pracy 8:00 Task planning (10 min) Journaling - [[KNOWLEDGES/5 minute journal]] (10 min) Own work (1 hour) To consider/implement 6 interesting habits:
